page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT I
page.content: Most people are employed outwith the area .The main sources of employment are to be found in Motherwell e.g. BSC Ravenscraig ,Anderson Strathclyde (coal cutting machinery manufacturers) Wishaw Industrial Estate. There are still a few miners left in the area but they also have to leave the area particularly to Polkemmet near Whitburn , West Lothian (now under threat of closure).However as they get older and they retire with few younger people in the area becoming miners eventually there will be none left. There are a considerable number of professional people e.g. Lawyers, Doctors, Bankers and Works Managers to be found living in the area .They tend to live in the private estates in the area but many still commute outwith the area e.g.Steelworks Managers and professional staff to Motherwell.
